views module

enoid_app.views.contact(request)[source]

Renders the contact page and saves a new message. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

enoid_app.views.home(request)[source]

Renders the home page. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

enoid_app.views.login_view(request)[source]

Renders the login page and authenticates the user. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

enoid_app.views.logout_view(request)[source]

Logs out the user and redirects to the home page. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

enoid_app.views.register(request)[source]

Renders the registration page and registers a new user. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

enoid_app.views.tour(request)[source]

Renders the tour dates page. :param request: HttpRequest object :return: HttpResponse object
